00025 #include <korebot/korebot.h>
00026 #include <linux/joystick.h>
00027 #include <signal.h>
00028 
00029 
00030 int sendflag   = 0;
00031 int timeflag   = 0;
00032 int actionflag = 0;
00033 int sock;                        /* Socket descriptor */
00034 
00035 #define ACT_KOA  0
00036 #define ACT_CAM1 1
00037 #define ACT_CAM2 2
00038 #define ACT_BOTH 3
00039 
00040 void handle_kill(int arg)
00041 {
00042   fprintf(stderr, "arg... killed\r\n");
00043   shutdown(sock,2);
00044 
00045   close(sock);
00046 
00047   exit(1);
00048 }
00049 
00050 #define leftspeed  50
00051 #define rightspeed 50
00052 #define maxspeed 120
00053 
00054 void handle_joyaxis(int number, int value, char * echoBuffer)
00055 {
00056   static int speed=0,right=rightspeed,left=leftspeed;
00057   static int campos0=0,campos1=0,campos2=0,campos3=0;
00058 
00059   switch(actionflag)
00060   {
00061     /* Moving the Koala */
00062     case ACT_KOA :
00063       if(number == 1) {
00064         if(right<30)
00065           right = 30;
00066         if(left<30)
00067           left = 30;
00068         speed = -((value*maxspeed)/32767);
00069         sprintf(echoBuffer,"setspeed %d %d\n",(speed*right)/100,(speed*left)/100);
00070         sendflag = 1;
00071         timeflag = 1;
00072       }
00073 
00074       if(number == 0) {
00075         right = (((value+32767)*100)/65534);
00076         left  = 100 - right;
00077         if(abs(speed) < 5) {
00078           sprintf(echoBuffer,"setspeed %d %d\n",right-rightspeed,left-leftspeed);
00079         }
00080         else {
00081           if(right<30)
00082             right = 30;
00083           if(left<30)
00084             left = 30;
00085           sprintf(echoBuffer,"setspeed %d %d\n",(speed*right)/100,(speed*left)/100);
00086         }
00087         sendflag = 1;
00088         timeflag = 1;
00089       }
00090       break;
00091 
00092       /* Moving camera 1 */
00093     case ACT_CAM1 :
00094       if(number == 1) {
00095         campos0 = ((value*50)/32767) + 50;
00096         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00097         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00098         //sendflag = 1;
00099         timeflag = 0;
00100       }
00101 
00102       if(number == 0) {
00103         campos1 = 50 - ((value*50)/32767);
00104         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00105         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00106         //sendflag = 1;
00107         timeflag = 0;
00108       }
00109       break;
00110 
00111       /* Moving camera 2 */
00112     case ACT_CAM2 :
00113       if(number == 1) {
00114         campos0 = ((value*50)/32767) + 50;
00115         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera2 %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00116         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera2 %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00117         //sendflag = 1;
00118         timeflag = 0;
00119       }
00120 
00121       if(number == 0) {
00122         campos1 = 50 - ((value*50)/32767);
00123         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera2 %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00124         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera2 %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00125         //sendflag = 1;
00126         timeflag = 0;
00127       }
00128       break;
00129 
00130       /* Moving both camera */
00131     case ACT_BOTH :
00132       if(number == 1) {
00133         campos0 = ((value*50)/32767) + 50;
00134         sprintf(echoBuffer,"moveboth %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00135         sendflag = 1;
00136         timeflag = 0;
00137       }
00138 
00139       if(number == 0) {
00140         campos1 = 50 - ((value*50)/32767);
00141         sprintf(echoBuffer,"moveboth %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00142         sendflag = 1;
00143         timeflag = 0;
00144       }
00145       break;
00146   }
00147 }
00148 
00149 void handle_joybutton(int number, int value, char * echoBuffer)
00150 {
00151   switch(number)
00152   {
00153     case 0 :
00154       /* play sound */
00155       if(value)
00156         ksock_send_command(sock,"playsound %d",1);
00157       break;
00158     case 1 :
00159       /* play sound */
00160       if(value)
00161         ksock_send_command(sock,"playsound %d",4);
00162       break;
00163     case 2 :
00164       if(value)
00165         actionflag = ACT_BOTH;
00166       else
00167         if(actionflag == ACT_BOTH)
00168         {
00169           //sprintf(echoBuffer,"moveboth %d %d\n",50,50);
00170           //sendflag = 1;
00171           actionflag = ACT_KOA;
00172         }
00173       break;
00174     case 3 :
00175       if(value)
00176         actionflag = ACT_CAM2;
00177       else
00178         if(actionflag == ACT_CAM2)
00179         {
00180           sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera2 %d %d\n",50,50);
00181           sendflag = 1;
00182           timeflag = 1;
00183           actionflag = ACT_KOA;
00184         }
00185       break;
00186     case 4 :
00187       if(value)
00188         actionflag = ACT_CAM1;
00189       else
00190         if(actionflag == ACT_CAM1)
00191         {
00192           sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera %d %d\n",50,50);
00193           sendflag = 1;
00194           timeflag = 1;
00195           actionflag = ACT_KOA;
00196         }
00197       break;
00198     case 5 :
00199       /* play sound */
00200       if(value)
00201         ksock_send_command(sock,"playsound %d",2);
00202       break;
00203     case 6 :
00204       /* play sound */
00205       if(value)
00206         ksock_send_command(sock,"playsound %d",3);
00207       break;
00208     case 10 :
00209       /* init camera */
00210       if(value)
00211         ksock_send_command(sock,"initcamera");
00212       break;
00213   } 
00214 }
00215 
00216 #define RCVBUFSIZE 32   /* Size of receive buffer */
00217 
00218 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00219 {
00220     struct timeval lastcommand, now, diff;
00221     struct timezone here;
00222 
00223     char *servIP;                    /* Server IP address (dotted quad) */
00224     unsigned short servPort;         /* Echo server port */
00225     char echoBuffer[RCVBUFSIZE];     /* Buffer for echo string */
00226     unsigned int echoStringLen;      /* Length of string to echo */
00227     int bytesRcvd, totalBytesRcvd;   /* Bytes read in single recv() 
00228                                         and total bytes read */
00229     int fd;
00230     int readevent;
00231     struct js_event e;
00232 
00233     /* Set signal handler */
00234     signal(SIGINT, handle_kill);
00235 
00236     /* Set the starting time */
00237     gettimeofday(&lastcommand,&here);
00238     
00239     if (argc < 3)     /* Test for correct number of arguments */
00240     {
00241        fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s <Server IP> <Port>\n", argv[0]);
00242        exit(1);
00243     }
00244 
00245     /* Open the Joystick device */
00246     fd = open ("/dev/input/js0", O_RDONLY|O_NONBLOCK);
00247     if(fd < 0)
00248     {
00249       printf("Cannot open joystick(/dev/input/js0)\r\n");
00250       exit(1);
00251     }
00252 
00253     servIP = argv[1];             /* First arg: server IP address (dotted quad) */
00254 
00255     servPort = atoi(argv[2]); /* Use given port, if any */
00256 
00257     ksock_init('\n',2048);
00258         
00259     sock = ksock_connect(servIP, servPort);
00260     if(sock > 0)
00261       printf("Connected to %s:%d\r\n",servIP,servPort);
00262 
00263     /* Start reading event from the joystick */
00264     readevent = read (fd, &e, sizeof(struct js_event));
00265 
00266     while (readevent >=0 || sendflag || errno == EAGAIN)
00267     {
00268       if(readevent >= 0)
00269       {
00270         /* A new event is available */
00271         e.type &= ~JS_EVENT_INIT;
00272         switch (e.type)
00273         {
00274 
00275           /* Handle joystick button event */
00276           case JS_EVENT_BUTTON:
00277             //printf("Button %d at pos %d\n", e.number, e.value);
00278             handle_joybutton(e.number,e.value,echoBuffer);
00279             break;
00280 
00281           /* Handle joystick axis event */
00282           case JS_EVENT_AXIS:
00283             //printf("Axis %d at pos %d\n", e.number, e.value);
00284             handle_joyaxis(e.number,e.value,echoBuffer);
00285             break;
00286         }
00287       }
00288 
00289       /* Send the command to the server if required */
00290       if(sendflag) {
00291         /* check timing between to commands */
00292         gettimeofday(&now,&here);
00293         timersub(&now,&lastcommand,&diff);
00294         //printf("elapsed: %ld.%.6ld\r\n",diff.tv_sec,diff.tv_usec);
00295 
00296         if(diff.tv_usec > 100000 || !timeflag)
00297         {
00298           lastcommand.tv_sec  = now.tv_sec;
00299           lastcommand.tv_usec = now.tv_usec;
00300 
00301           printf("%s\n",echoBuffer);
00302           /* Send the command to the robot */
00303           echoStringLen = strlen(echoBuffer);
00304           if (send(sock, echoBuffer, echoStringLen, 0) != echoStringLen)
00305             DieWithError("send() sent a different number of bytes than expected");
00306           /* Receive the same string back from the server */
00307           totalBytesRcvd = 0;
00308           printf("Received: ");                /* Setup to print the echoed string */
00309           while (totalBytesRcvd < echoStringLen)
00310           {
00311             /* Receive up to the buffer size (minus 1 to leave space for
00312                a null terminator) bytes from the sender */
00313             if ((bytesRcvd = recv(sock, echoBuffer, RCVBUFSIZE - 1, 0)) <= 0)
00314               DieWithError("recv() failed or connection closed prematurely");
00315             totalBytesRcvd += bytesRcvd;   /* Keep tally of total bytes */
00316             echoBuffer[bytesRcvd] = '\0';  /* Terminate the string! */
00317             printf(echoBuffer);            /* Print the echo buffer */
00318           }
00319 
00320           printf("\n");    /* Print a final linefeed */
00321 
00322           sendflag = 0;
00323         }
00324       }
00325 
00326       /* Read the next event */
00327       readevent = read (fd, &e, sizeof(struct js_event));
00328     }
00329 
00330     close(fd);
00331     close(sock);
00332     exit(0);
00333 }
